title: Ticket #6291: collector_plugin and python modules are not documented
description:
Greetings, I found no documentation in the manual about the collector_plugins and the python modules (COLLECTOR_PLUGIN_PYTHON_MODULES). These are mentioned in #6213

I found no mention in the index or in the hooks section: http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/current/4_4Hooks.html
creator: marco
